name.th: สรุปข้อความ

short.ar: هذا الملخص يحول النصوص إلى فيديوهات مولدة بالذكاء الاصطناعي، مثالي للمتعلمين المرئيين ومحبي التعلم السريع.
short.am: እነዚህ የጽሑፍ አጠቃላይ በሰሜነ ምህንድስና ቪዲዮዎች ላይ ያስተምረዋል፣ ለእንቅስቃሴ መማርና ታይቶ ማማር ቀላል አድርጎታል።
short.bg: Този инструмент обобщава текстове в AI видео, идеален за визуални ученици и микролърнъри.
short.bn: এই আর্টিকেল সামারাইজার টেক্সটকে এআই জেনারেটেড ভিডিওতে রূপান্তর করে, মাইক্রো এবং ভিজ্যুয়াল লার্নারদের জন্য আদর্শ।
short.ca: Aquest resumidor transforma textos en vídeos generats amb IA, ideal per a microaprenents i visuals.
short.cs: Tento shrnovač převádí texty na videa generovaná AI, ideální pro vizuální a mikro studium.
short.da: Denne resuméfunktion omdanner tekst til AI-genererede videoer, perfekt til visuelle og mikroelever.
short.de: Dieser Artikelzusammenfasser erstellt KI-generierte Videos, ideal für Mikro- und visuelle Lerner.
short.el: Αυτό το εργαλείο συνοψίζει κείμενα σε βίντεο AI, ιδανικό για οπτικούς και μικροεκπαιδευόμενους.
short.en,en_US: Use article summarizer to turn text into an AI video. Article to video for speed reading and for a visual learner.
short.en_AU,en_GB: Use article summariser to turn text into an AI video. Article to video for speed reading and for a visual learner.
short.es: Este resumen convierte textos en vídeos generados por IA, ideal para microaprendices y visuales.
short.es_419: Convierte texto en vídeos de IA, ideal para microaprendices y visuales.
short.et: See tööriist muudab tekstid AI loodud videoteks, ideaalne visuaalsetele ja mikroõppijatele.
short.fa: این ابزار متن را به ویدیوهای تولید شده توسط هوش مصنوعی تبدیل می‌کند، ایده‌آل برای یادگیرندگان بصری و کوچک.
short.fi: Tämä tiivistäjä muuntaa tekstin tekoälyn luomiksi videoiksi, ihanteellinen visuaalisille ja mikro-oppijoille.
short.fil: Ginagawa nitong AI videos ang text, perpekto para sa micro at visual learners.
short.fr: Ce résumeur transforme les textes en vidéos générées par IA, idéal pour les micro-apprenants et visuels.
short.gu: આ લેખ સંક્ષેપક લખાણને AI જનરેટેડ વિડિઓમાં રૂપાંતરિત કરે છે, માઇક્રો અને વિઝ્યુઅલ લર્નર્સ માટે આદર્શ છે.
short.he: כלי זה ממיר טקסט לסרטוני AI, אידיאלי ללומדים חזותיים ומיקרו.
short.hi: यह टूल टेक्स्ट को एआई-निर्मित वीडियो में बदलता है, सूक्ष्म और दृश्य शिक्षार्थियों के लिए उपयुक्त।
short.hr: Pretvara tekst u AI videozapise, idealno za mikro i vizualne učenike.
short.hu: Ez az eszköz szövegeket AI videókká alakít, ideális vizuális és mikro tanulók számára.
short.id: Mengubah teks menjadi video AI, ideal untuk pembelajar mikro dan visual.
short.it: Trasforma il testo in video generati dall'IA, ideale per micro e visual learner.
short.ja: テキストをAI生成ビデオに変換するツール。マイクロラーニングやビジュアル学習に最適。
short.kn: ಪಠ್ಯವನ್ನು AI-ನಿಂದ ರಚನೆಯಾದ ವೀಡಿಯೋಗೆ ಪರಿವರ್ತಿಸುತ್ತದೆ, ದೃಶ್ಯ ಮತ್ತು ಮೈಸಕ್ರೋ ಕಲಿಕೆಗಾರರಿಗೆ ಐಡಿಯಲ್.
short.ko: 텍스트를 AI 생성 비디오로 변환합니다. 마이크로 및 시각 학습자에게 적합합니다.
short.lt: Šis įrankis paverčia tekstus AI sukurtomis vaizdo įrašais, puikiai tinka vizualiems ir mikro mokiniams.
short.lv: Pārveido tekstu par AI ģenerētiem videoklipiem, ideāli mikro un vizuāliem mācītājiem.
short.ml: ഈ സംഗ്രാഹം ടെക്സ്റ്റ് എഐ നിർമ്മിച്ച വീഡിയോകളാക്കുന്നു, മൈക്രോയും കാഴ്ചയും പഠനത്തിന് അനുയോജ്യം.
short.mr: मजकूर AI-निर्मित व्हिडिओमध्ये बदलतो, सूक्ष्म आणि दृश्यमाध्यम शिकणाऱ्यांसाठी उपयुक्त.
short.ms: Tukar teks kepada video AI, sesuai untuk pelajar mikro dan visual.
short.nl: Converteert tekst naar AI-video’s, ideaal voor micro- en visuele leerlingen.
short.no: Gjør tekst om til AI-genererte videoer, perfekt for mikro- og visuelle lærere.
short.pl: Przekształca tekst w filmy generowane przez AI, idealne dla wizualnych i mikro uczniów.
short.pt_BR: Converte texto em vídeos de IA, ideal para micro e visuais aprendizes.
short.pt_PT: Transforma texto em vídeos gerados por IA, perfeito para aprendizagem visual e micro.
short.ro: Transformă textul în videoclipuri generate de AI, ideal pentru microînvățători și vizuali.
short.ru: Этот ИИ инструмент превращает текст в видео, идеально для микролернеров и визуалов.
short.sk: Tento nástroj mení texty na AI videá, ideálne pre vizuálnych a mikro študentov.
short.sl: Pretvori besedilo v AI video posnetke, idealno za mikro in vizualne učence.
short.sr: Претвара текст у видео снимке са вештачком интелигенцијом, идеално за микро и визуелне ученике.
short.sv: Konverterar text till AI-genererade videor, perfekt för mikro- och visuell inlärning.
short.sw: Hubadilisha maandishi kuwa video za AI, bora kwa wanafunzi wa kuona na wa haraka.
short.ta: உரையை AI உருவாக்கிய வீடியோக்களாக மாற்றுகிறது, சிறிய மற்றும் பார்வை கற்றலாளர்களுக்கு சிறந்தது.
short.te: టెక్స్ట్‌ను AI రూపొందించిన వీడియోలుగా మార్చే సాధనం, మైక్రో మరియు విజువల్ లెర్నర్లకు అనువైనది.
short.th: แปลงข้อความเป็นวิดีโอ AI เหมาะสำหรับผู้เรียนที่ชอบมองเห็นและเรียนรู้ขนาดเล็ก.
short.tr: Metni AI videolarına dönüştürür, görsel ve mikro öğrenenler için idealdir.
short.uk: Перетворює текст у відео з ШІ, ідеально підходить для мікро- та візуальних учнів.
short.vi: Biến văn bản thành video AI, lý tưởng cho người học vi mô và trực quan.
short.zh_CN: 将文本转化为AI生成的视频，非常适合微型学习者和视觉学习者。
short.zh_TW: 將文本轉為 AI 生成影片，適合微型學習者與視覺學習者。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Unlock a whole new way to consume content! This powerful AI-driven extension converts written articles into engaging video summaries, making information more accessible, especially for visual learners and users with ADHD or dyslexia. Ideal for anyone looking to maximize daily microlearning efficiency, this tool offers a convenient alternative to traditional reading by presenting complex information in a simple, visual format.

🌟 Why Choose AI Video Summaries?
With this innovative Chrome Extension, turn lengthy articles into quick, digestible videos. Whether you're a student, professional, or just someone who enjoys learning on the go, this tool caters to all content enthusiasts who consume large volumes of information.
✔️ Visual Learning Made Easy – Designed with visual learners in mind, the extension enables you to absorb information more effectively.
✔️ Supports ADHD & Dyslexia – Specially crafted for accessibility, allowing those with ADHD or dyslexia to engage with content in a format that suits them.
✔️ Save Time – Get essential insights faster by converting text into video summaries, perfect for busy schedules.

💪 Key Features
✔️ Instant Video Summaries – Convert articles into AI-powered video summaries for rapid learning.
✔️ Supports Microlearning – Ideal for quick, focused learning sessions.
✔️ Smart Content Simplification – The AI summarizes complex information, making it easy to understand and retain.
✔️ Visual & Auditory Engagement – Benefit from video and audio elements that enhance learning and retention.

🛠️ How It Works
1. Install the Extension – Add it to Chrome for easy access.
2. Select an Article – Open any article or blog post you want to summarize.
3. Let AI Work – Click to let AI generate a concise, engaging video summary.
4. Watch & Learn – Enjoy learning in a visually rich format tailored to your needs.

📌 Who Can Benefit?
✔️ Content Enthusiasts – Anyone who consumes a high volume of information and prefers video over text.
✔️ Students & Researchers – Ideal for exploring complex topics and summarizing extensive material.
✔️ Busy Professionals – Perfect for professionals who need quick overviews and fast learning on the go.
✔️ Educators & Trainers – Useful for those creating study aids or instructional content.

✅ Benefits of AI Video Summaries
✔️ Accessible Learning – Designed to support diverse learning needs, including ADHD and dyslexia.
✔️ Improves Retention – Visual content aids memory, helping you retain key information more effectively.
✔️ Engages Attention – An ideal tool for anyone who finds it challenging to focus on lengthy text.

🌍 Perfect for a Variety of Content
Whether it’s an explainer article, a tutorial, or a deep-dive, this extension transforms it all. With built-in accessibility features, it supports ADHD and dyslexia, making it a versatile tool for all users.

🚀 Get Started Today!
Transform the way you learn by converting articles into video summaries. With a focus on accessibility and efficiency, this AI-powered tool is perfect for students, professionals, and content lovers alike. Experience a smarter way to engage with information that saves time and enhances retention.
long.en:
Unlock a smarter way to engage with information! With the Article Summarizer, transform written articles into dynamic AI video summaries, perfect for speed reading and visual learners. This Chrome Extension simplifies complex information, making it accessible and engaging for everyone, including those with learning differences like ADHD and dyslexia. Say goodbye to information overload and hello to efficient, focused learning!

🌟 Why Choose Article Summarizer?
Turn lengthy articles into concise, visually engaging summaries. Whether you’re a student, professional, or a lifelong learner, this tool is designed for anyone who values microlearning and needs a quick way to absorb information.
🔄 For Visual Learners – Perfect for those who retain information better through visual and auditory formats.
🙏 Supports Accessibility – Tailored for users with ADHD and dyslexia, offering an inclusive learning experience.
⏰ Time-Saving – Summarize articles into video summaries in seconds, perfect for busy schedules.

⚙️ Key Features
✨ Instant Video Summaries – Convert any article into a concise AI-powered video summary.
✨ Multi-Language Support – Watch video summaries in your preferred language, regardless of the original content language.
✨ History Tracking – Save all your generated videos for easy revisiting.
✨ Shareable Links – Share video summaries with friends, classmates, or colleagues with just one click.
✨ Content Simplification – Distills complex information into easy-to-understand videos.
✨ Supports Diverse Needs – Designed to help individuals manage ADHD and dyslexia with tailored accessibility features.

🔧 How It Works
1. Install the Extension – Add it to Chrome for quick access.
2. Select an Article – Open any online article you’d like summarized.
3. Generate Video Summary – Let the AI create a visual and auditory summary.
4. Watch and Share – Absorb information visually or share with others easily.

📊 Who Will Benefit?
✨ Visual Learners – Ideal for those who prefer engaging visuals over reading text.
✨ Busy Professionals – Quickly turn text into digestible content for on-the-go learning.
✨ Students and Researchers – Simplifies understanding of complex topics for study and research.
✨ Content Consumers – Perfect for tackling information overload with efficient summaries.

🌍 What Makes It Unique?
This tool bridges the gap between traditional reading and modern learning. By creating video summaries, it caters to a variety of learning preferences, making it a must-have for:
🔄 Fast Readers – Quickly grasp the essence of articles without sacrificing detail.
🙏 ADHD Tools – Keeps users focused and engaged.
⏰ Dyslexia Tools – Presents content in a digestible format for easier comprehension.
🔧 Multitaskers – Learn efficiently while juggling a busy schedule.
🌐 Microlearning Enthusiasts – Absorb information in bite-sized videos.

🚀 Perfect for Any Content
Whether it’s how-to guides, detailed tutorials, Wikipedia pages, or in-depth analysis, Article Summarizer transforms all types of text into engaging video summaries, giving you:
🌟 Faster access to insights.
🌟 Improved information retention.
🌟 A more personalized learning experience.

📚 Get Started Now!
Transform the way you consume information with Article Summarizer. Whether you’re looking to boost your productivity, enhance your learning, or make content more accessible, this AI summarizer has you covered.

Install now and take the first step towards smarter, faster, and more engaging learning!
